languages.text: "Неплохо сказано, Зауэрбэк. Раз обещали — поддержите. Я облагаю ваш род податью — будете поставлять мне солдат. А ты, юноша, их возглавишь".

traits.locale_text: "Неплохо сказано, Зауэрбек. Раз в вас столько огня, я облагаю ваш род податью — будете поставлять мне солдат. А ты, юноша, их возглавишь".

languages.text: "Well said, Sauerback. Since you have already promised it, I will accept your support. I hereby impose a duty on your house — you are to provide me with soldiers. And you, young man, are to lead them."
languages.original_text: "Неплохо сказано, Зауэрбэк. Раз обещали — поддержите. Я облагаю ваш род податью — будете поставлять мне солдат. А ты, юноша, их возглавишь".

traits.locale_text: "Well said, Sauerback. Since there is so much fire in you, I hereby impose a duty on your house — you are to provide me with soldiers. And you, young man, are to lead them."
"Well said, Sauerback. Since there is so much fire in you, I hereby impose a duty on your house — you are to provide me with soldiers. And you, young man, are to lead them."

"Well said, Sauerback. Since you have already promised it, I will accept your support. I hereby impose a duty on your house — you are to provide me with soldiers. And you, young man, are to lead them."

"Well said, Sauerback. Since you have already promised it, I will accept your support. I hereby impose a duty on your house — you are to provide me with soldiers. And you, young man, are to lead them."

"Well said, Sauerback. Since you have already promised it, I will accept your support. I hereby impose a duty on your house — you are to provide me with soldiers. And you, young man, are to lead them."

languages.text: 「よく言った、ザウアーバック。以前に約束したとおり、その支援を受けたい。これにより、私はザウアーバック家に義務を課す。兵士を供給せよ。そして若き青年よ、お前が彼らを率いるのだ」
languages.original_text: "Well said, Sauerback. Since you have already promised it, I will accept your support. I hereby impose a duty on your house — you are to provide me with soldiers. And you, young man, are to lead them."

traits.locale_text: 「よく言った、ザウアーバック。以前に約束したとおり、その支援を受けたい。これにより、私はザウアーバック家に義務を課す。兵士を供給せよ。そして若き青年よ、お前が彼らを率いるのだ」

languages.text: “说得好，苏尔贝克。既然你已经答应了我，那我愿意接受你的支持。在此，我向你们家族发布一项任务——你们要为我提供士兵。至于你，年轻人，你负责指挥这些士兵。”
languages.original_text: "Well said, Sauerback. Since you have already promised it, I will accept your support. I hereby impose a duty on your house — you are to provide me with soldiers. And you, young man, are to lead them."

traits.locale_text: “说得好，苏尔贝克。既然你已经答应了我，那我愿意接受你的支持。在此，我向你们家族发布一项任务——你们要为我提供士兵。至于你，年轻人，你负责指挥这些士兵。”

languages.text: «Bien dicho, Sauerback. Puesto que ya lo ha prometido, aceptaré su apoyo. Concedo a su casa el deber de proporcionarme tropas que liderará usted personalmente, joven».
languages.original_text: "Well said, Sauerback. Since you have already promised it, I will accept your support. I hereby impose a duty on your house — you are to provide me with soldiers. And you, young man, are to lead them."

traits.locale_text: «Bien dicho, Sauerback. Puesto que ya lo ha prometido, aceptaré su apoyo. Concedo a su casa el deber de proporcionarme tropas que liderará usted personalmente, joven».

languages.text: « Bien dit, Sauerback. Puisque vous me l'avez déjà offert, j'accepte votre soutien. Je confie donc à votre maison le devoir de me fournir des soldats. Et vous, jeune homme, serez leur commandant. »
languages.original_text: "Well said, Sauerback. Since you have already promised it, I will accept your support. I hereby impose a duty on your house — you are to provide me with soldiers. And you, young man, are to lead them."

traits.locale_text: « Bien dit, Sauerback. Puisque vous me l'avez déjà offert, j'accepte votre soutien. Je confie donc à votre maison le devoir de me fournir des soldats. Et vous, jeune homme, serez leur commandant. »

languages.text: "Gut gesprochen, Sauerback. Da Ihr Eure Unterstützung bereits zugesagt habt, nehme ich sie an. Euer Haus erhält hiermit eine Pflicht – Ihr müsst mich mit Soldaten versorgen. Und Ihr, junger Mann, werdet sie anführen."
languages.original_text: "Well said, Sauerback. Since you have already promised it, I will accept your support. I hereby impose a duty on your house — you are to provide me with soldiers. And you, young man, are to lead them."

traits.locale_text: "Gut gesprochen, Sauerback. Da Ihr Eure Unterstützung bereits zugesagt habt, nehme ich sie an. Euer Haus erhält hiermit eine Pflicht – Ihr müsst mich mit Soldaten versorgen. Und Ihr, junger Mann, werdet sie anführen."

languages.text: "Ağzına sağlık Sauerback. Madem bunun sözünü verdin, o hâlde desteğini kabul ediyorum. Bu vesileyle hanene bir vazife veriyorum: Bana asker temin edeceksiniz. Delikanlı, sen de onların başında olacaksın."
languages.original_text: "Well said, Sauerback. Since you have already promised it, I will accept your support. I hereby impose a duty on your house — you are to provide me with soldiers. And you, young man, are to lead them."

traits.locale_text: "Ağzına sağlık Sauerback. Madem bunun sözünü verdin bile, o hâlde desteğini kabul ediyorum. Bu vesileyle hanene bir vazife veriyorum: Bana asker temin edeceksiniz. Delikanlı, sen de onların başında olacaksın."
